title: 我的世界闲聊
txt_content: 呵呵哒，我的世界是一个让我不读书的游戏，我也是醉了

replies.author: 凛
replies.txt_content:
LZ你在说什么
我表示一脸懵逼

replies.author: 爱范希
replies.txt_content: 字面理解，玩MC太入迷不能好好读书了

replies.author: Because.
replies.txt_content:
你想表达什么




--------“支配与被支配的人，是否会心生恨意？

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
额，看到楼主被封我就安心了 2333XD






"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.author: Mr_Liuxing
replies.txt_content: 这只是个游戏，你见过哪个游戏要读书的吗？呵呵哒。
你想表达什么 我听不懂

replies.txt_content: LZ经历了什么！那么年轻就去末地了！
